CustomField.formula:
IF( Work_Order__r.Is_Tow_WorkType__c = true,
DISTANCE(
GEOLOCATION( IF (Latitude = 0, D3_Address_Geocode__Latitude__s,Latitude ),
IF (Longitude = 0, D3_Address_Geocode__Longitude__s, Longitude)),
GEOLOCATION( IF(FSL__Related_Service__r.Latitude = 0, FSL__Related_Service__r.D3_Address_Geocode__Latitude__s,FSL__Related_Service__r.Latitude ),
IF(FSL__Related_Service__r.Longitude = 0, FSL__Related_Service__r.D3_Address_Geocode__Longitude__s, FSL__Related_Service__r.Longitude ))
,'mi' ),
0)
CustomField.label: Tow Mileage
